diff_hunk:
@@ -127,8 +129,31 @@ class ByteTensor(_C.ByteTensorBase, _TensorBase):
     def is_signed(self):
         return False
 
+class SparseDoubleTensor(_C.SparseDoubleTensorBase, _TensorBase):
+    def is_signed(self):
+        return True
+class SparseFloatTensor(_C.SparseFloatTensorBase, _TensorBase):
+    def is_signed(self):
+        return True
+class SparseLongTensor(_C.SparseLongTensorBase, _TensorBase):
+    def is_signed(self):
+        return True
+class SparseIntTensor(_C.SparseIntTensorBase, _TensorBase):
+    def is_signed(self):
+        return True
+class SparseShortTensor(_C.SparseShortTensorBase, _TensorBase):
+    def is_signed(self):
+        return True
+class SparseCharTensor(_C.SparseCharTensorBase, _TensorBase):
+    def is_signed(self):
+        # TODO
+        return False
+class SparseByteTensor(_C.SparseByteTensorBase, _TensorBase):
+    def is_signed(self):
+        return False
 
 _tensor_classes = set()
+_sparse_tensor_classes = set()
body: I don't think we need `_sparse_tensor_classes`. `_tensor_classes` is used only for `torch.is_tensor` and `THPModule_isTensor`.
body_html: I don't think we need _sparse_tensor_classes. _tensor_classes is used only for torch.is_tensor and THPModule_isTensor.
